snippet: Four times world champion Sebastian Vettel is leaving Red Bull at the end of the season and is set to join Ferrari, the Formula One team said on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Vettel to Leave Red Bull, Set for Ferrari-Horner
headline.main: Vettel to Leave Red Bull, Set for Ferrari-Horner

lead_paragraph: Four times world champion Sebastian Vettel is leaving Red Bull at the end of the season and is set to join Ferrari, the Formula One team said on Saturday.
